skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, artifacts, posters, or applications (examples include websites, landing pages, dashboards, React components, HTML/CSS layouts, or when styling/beautifying any web UI). Generates creative, polished code and UI design that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
skill.summary: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill wh...

security_audit.summary: Official skill with text-only guidance. Minimal audit performed as requested. No security concerns identified.

content.value_statement: You need frontend layouts that feel distinctive and professional. This skill guides bold design choices and clean implementation details.
actual_capabilities: Guides selection of a clear, bold aesthetic direction
Provides typography guidance and avoids generic font choices
Sets color, theme, and CSS variable consistency principles
Outlines motion and animation priorities for UI impact
Encourages spatial composition and background effects for depth
limitations: Does not implement backend logic or data services
Does not run usability testing or user research
Does not guarantee accessibility or cross browser validation

use_cases.title: Pitch ready landing page
use_cases.description: Create a distinctive landing page concept with bold typography and refined layout details.

use_cases.title: Brand aligned marketing site
use_cases.description: Translate a brand tone into a cohesive interface with memorable visuals.

use_cases.title: Polished component styling
use_cases.description: Elevate component aesthetics with purposeful color, spacing, and animation.

prompt_templates.title: Hero section starter
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a landing page hero for a travel app. Use a bold aesthetic, distinct typography, and a subtle background texture.

prompt_templates.title: Dashboard layout
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a dashboard layout for a finance tool. Use asymmetry, clear data hierarchy, and restrained motion cues.

prompt_templates.title: Brand refresh
prompt_templates.prompt: Redesign a boutique coffee site with a new visual direction. Provide typography pairing and color variables.

prompt_templates.title: Experimental poster page
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a single page editorial poster layout with dramatic type, layered gradients, and staggered reveal animations.

output_examples.input: Create a minimalist portfolio homepage with refined typography and soft motion.
output: Elegant serif display font paired with a clean sans body font
Neutral palette with one sharp accent color for calls to action
Large negative space and offset grid for visual tension
Single page load animation with staggered section reveals

best_practices: Commit to a single aesthetic direction and execute it consistently
Use distinctive font pairings and define CSS variables early
Focus motion on one impactful moment with clear timing
anti_patterns: Defaulting to generic font stacks and common layouts
Using timid color palettes without a clear dominant hue
Adding scattered micro animations without a unified plan

faq.question: What platforms does this skill support?
faq.answer: It provides guidance for web UI work, including HTML, CSS, and common frontend frameworks.

faq.question: What are the main limits of this skill?
faq.answer: It focuses on design guidance and does not include backend logic or automated testing.

faq.question: How can I integrate it into my workflow?
faq.answer: Use it to define design direction and then implement the code in your existing project setup.

faq.question: Does it handle data safety or privacy?
faq.answer: It does not process data. Follow your organization rules for any user data handling.

faq.question: What if the output feels too generic?
faq.answer: Provide a stronger aesthetic direction, target audience, and constraints to guide specificity.

faq.question: How does it compare to general UI advice?
faq.answer: It emphasizes bold, distinctive aesthetics and practical implementation details.
